### LICENSE

<img src="https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/47567770/440167089-ed5b9ab3-ce32-4fa7-8c7d-216324970e21.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..zpYtTN5aFZXbq4EnFDZJgncPLGO9kNUsMjH-9hMEG0A" alt="Alt Text" width="1200"/>

---

- Supported Platforms: OpenShift, Rancher, VMware Tanzu, ..
- Veeam Backup & Replication. It can also backup applications and data to other storage solutions like NFS file servers. Veeam Kasten's application-centric approach allows for flexible choice of infrastructure while ensuring simplicity of operations

<br>
<br>

---

## Editions

https://www.veeam.com/products/cloud/kubernetes-backup/pricing.html

- default Starter edition (no charge: evaluation or small non-production clusters, limited from a support and scale)
 is functionally the same as the Enterprise edition but perspective.


[see the code on github](https://github.com/joshed-io/reveal-hugo)
